abstract: Rajiv Goel, a former Intel executive who leaked secret information about his employer to Raj Rajaratnam, the fallen hedge fund billionaire, avoided prison on Monday as a judge sentenced him to two years’ probation.
snippet: Rajiv Goel, a former Intel executive who leaked secret information about his employer to Raj Rajaratnam, the fallen hedge fund billionaire, avoided prison on Monday as a judge sentenced him to two years’ probation.
lead_paragraph: A former Intel executive who leaked secret information about his employer to Raj Rajaratnam, the fallen hedge fund billionaire, avoided prison on Monday when a judge sentenced him to two years’ probation.

headline.main: A Crucial Witness in Rajaratnam Trial Receives Probation
headline.print_headline: Insider Trading Witness Given Probation for Testifying Against Hedge Fund Titan
